Articles.Content:
I know this might sound weird but...

How do I ask a girl out?

And how do I prevent a breakup?

...Why do you need to ask this on the forums?...

And 2... Be picky. Hormones are raging during high school.. And people make stupid descisions. You act confident, with posture as straight as a rod with no desire to SEEK,

While acting nice, Honorable, but stand your ground.. With a sense of humor? And, Friend, They'll be seeking YOU. For now. Don't succumb to peer pressure, and make friends. If they prove to be more than Braindead and unloyal, Then they may be good canidats in, say, Senior year?

...Why do you need to ask this on the forums?...

Cause I have no other opion at this point

Edited September 30, 2013 by Leonov

How do I ask a girl out?

And how do I prevent a breakup?

If you find out, tell me how.

I know this might sound weird but...

How do I ask a girl out?

And how do I prevent a breakup?

1. You come to her and ask her: "Would you like to go to the cinema with me?" with a calm expression of your face. It might sound stupid, but that's it. The wisdom is there. No need to make things more complicated than that.

2. Don't be a jerk, listen to her. Lots of talk and, if you're of legal age, lots of good, uninhibited sex.

If you're in a highschool, it would be better to wait with the sex thing for some time. Don't rush these things just for the sake of bragging. That's stupid.

The best way to do it is to go forth and try it. You'll make mistakes, but that's how you learn what to do.

/thread
